ipv4Address.description: The IPv4 address of this A record.

ipv6Address.description: The IPv6 address of this AAAA record.

cname.description: The canonical name for this CNAME record.

exchange.description: The domain name of the mail host for this MX record.

preference.description: The preference value for this MX record.

nsdname.description: The name server name for this NS record.

ptrdname.description: The PTR target domain name for this PTR record.

RecordSet.description: Describes a DNS record set (a collection of DNS records with the same name and type).

etag.description: The etag of the record set.

id.description: The ID of the record set.

name.description: The name of the record set.

properties.description: The properties of the record set.

type.description: The type of the record set.

RecordSetListResult.description: The response to a record set List operation.

nextLink.description: The continuation token for the next page of results.

value.description: Information about the record sets in the response.

RecordSetProperties.description: Represents the properties of the records in the record set.

AAAARecords.description: The list of AAAA records in the record set.

ARecords.description: The list of A records in the record set.

CNAMERecord.description: The CNAME record in the  record set.

MXRecords.description: The list of MX records in the record set.

NSRecords.description: The list of NS records in the record set.

PTRRecords.description: The list of PTR records in the record set.

SOARecord.description: The SOA record in the record set.

SRVRecords.description: The list of SRV records in the record set.

TTL.description: The TTL (time-to-live) of the records in the record set.

TXTRecords.description: The list of TXT records in the record set.

metadata.description: The metadata attached to the record set.

RecordSetUpdateParameters.description: Parameters supplied to update a record set.

RecordSet.description: Specifies information about the record set being updated.

email.description: The email contact for this SOA record.

expireTime.description: The expire time for this SOA record.

host.description: The domain name of the authoritative name server for this SOA record.

minimumTTL.description: The minimum value for this SOA record. By convention this is used to determine the negative caching duration.

refreshTime.description: The refresh value for this SOA record.

retryTime.description: The retry time for this SOA record.

serialNumber.description: The serial number for this SOA record.

port.description: The port value for this SRV record.

priority.description: The priority value for this SRV record.

target.description: The target domain name for this SRV record.

weight.description: The weight value for this SRV record.

value.description: The text value of this TXT record.

ZoneDeleteResult.description: The response to a Zone Delete operation.

azureAsyncOperation.description: Users can perform a Get on Azure-AsyncOperation to get the status of their delete Zone operations.

ZoneListResult.description: The response to a Zone List or ListAll operation.

nextLink.description: The continuation token for the next page of results.

ZoneProperties.description: Represents the properties of the zone.

maxNumberOfRecordSets.description: The maximum number of record sets that can be created in this DNS zone.  This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

nameServers.description: The name servers for this DNS zone. This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

numberOfRecordSets.description: The current number of record sets in this DNS zone.  This is a read-only property and any attempt to set this value will be ignored.

actions.title: Zones_List
actions.description: Lists the DNS zones in all resource groups in a subscription.

$top.description: The maximum number of DNS zones to return. If not specified, returns up to 100 zones.

subscriptionId.description: Specifies the Azure subscription ID, which uniquely identifies the Microsoft Azure subscription.

actions.title: Zones_ListByResourceGroup
actions.description: Lists the DNS zones within a resource group.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group.

$top.description: The maximum number of record sets to return. If not specified, returns up to 100 record sets.

subscriptionId.description: Specifies the Azure subscription ID, which uniquely identifies the Microsoft Azure subscription.

actions.title: Zones_Delete
actions.description: Deletes a DNS zone. WARNING: All DNS records in the zone will also be deleted. This operation cannot be undone.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group.

zoneName.description: The name of the DNS zone (without a terminating dot).

If-Match.description: The etag of the DNS zone. Omit this value to always delete the current zone. Specify the last-seen etag value to prevent accidentally deleting any concurrent changes.

subscriptionId.description: Specifies the Azure subscription ID, which uniquely identifies the Microsoft Azure subscription.

actions.title: Zones_Get
actions.description: Gets a DNS zone. Retrieves the zone properties, but not the record sets within the zone.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group.

zoneName.description: The name of the DNS zone (without a terminating dot).

subscriptionId.description: Specifies the Azure subscription ID, which uniquely identifies the Microsoft Azure subscription.

actions.title: Zones_CreateOrUpdate
actions.description: Creates or updates a DNS zone. Does not modify DNS records within the zone.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group.

zoneName.description: The name of the DNS zone (without a terminating dot).

If-Match.description: The etag of the DNS zone. Omit this value to always overwrite the current zone. Specify the last-seen etag value to prevent accidentally overwritting any concurrent changes.

If-None-Match.description: Set to '*' to allow a new DNS zone to be created, but to prevent updating an existing zone. Other values will be ignored.

subscriptionId.description: Specifies the Azure subscription ID, which uniquely identifies the Microsoft Azure subscription.

actions.title: RecordSets_ListByDnsZone
actions.description: Lists all record sets in a DNS zone.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group.

zoneName.description: The name of the DNS zone (without a terminating dot).

$top.description: The maximum number of record sets to return. If not specified, returns up to 100 record sets.

subscriptionId.description: Specifies the Azure subscription ID, which uniquely identifies the Microsoft Azure subscription.

actions.title: RecordSets_ListByType
actions.description: Lists the record sets of a specified type in a DNS zone.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group.

zoneName.description: The name of the DNS zone (without a terminating dot).

recordType.description: The type of record sets to enumerate.

$top.description: The maximum number of record sets to return. If not specified, returns up to 100 record sets.

subscriptionId.description: Specifies the Azure subscription ID, which uniquely identifies the Microsoft Azure subscription.

actions.title: RecordSets_Delete
actions.description: Deletes a record set from a DNS zone. This operation cannot be undone.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group.

zoneName.description: The name of the DNS zone (without a terminating dot).

relativeRecordSetName.description: The name of the record set, relative to the name of the zone.

recordType.description: The type of DNS record in this record set. Record sets of type SOA cannot be deleted (they are deleted when the DNS zone is deleted).

If-Match.description: The etag of the record set. Omit this value to always delete the current record set. Specify the last-seen etag value to prevent accidentally deleting any concurrent changes.

subscriptionId.description: Specifies the Azure subscription ID, which uniquely identifies the Microsoft Azure subscription.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group.

zoneName.description: The name of the DNS zone (without a terminating dot).

relativeRecordSetName.description: The name of the record set, relative to the name of the zone.

recordType.description: The type of DNS record in this record set.

subscriptionId.description: Specifies the Azure subscription ID, which uniquely identifies the Microsoft Azure subscription.

actions.title: RecordSets_Update
actions.description: Updates a record set within a DNS zone.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group.

zoneName.description: The name of the DNS zone (without a terminating dot).

relativeRecordSetName.description: The name of the record set, relative to the name of the zone.

recordType.description: The type of DNS record in this record set.

If-Match.description: The etag of the record set. Omit this value to always overwrite the current record set. Specify the last-seen etag value to prevent accidentally overwritting concurrent changes.

subscriptionId.description: Specifies the Azure subscription ID, which uniquely identifies the Microsoft Azure subscription.

actions.title: RecordSets_CreateOrUpdate
actions.description: Creates or updates a record set within a DNS zone.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group.

zoneName.description: The name of the DNS zone (without a terminating dot).

relativeRecordSetName.description: The name of the record set, relative to the name of the zone.

recordType.description: The type of DNS record in this record set. Record sets of type SOA can be updated but not created (they are created when the DNS zone is created).

If-Match.description: The etag of the record set. Omit this value to always overwrite the current record set. Specify the last-seen etag value to prevent accidentally overwritting any concurrent changes.

If-None-Match.description: Set to '*' to allow a new record set to be created, but to prevent updating an existing record set. Other values will be ignored.

subscriptionId.description: Specifies the Azure subscription ID, which uniquely identifies the Microsoft Azure subscription.
